examples.description: redirects to the login page if :name is nil
examples.full_description: SessionsController post create redirects to the login page if :name is nil

examples.description: redirects to login page if :name is empty
examples.full_description: SessionsController post create redirects to login page if :name is empty
SessionsController post create sets session[:name] if :name was given
SessionsController post create redirects to "/" if logged in

examples.description: leaves session[:name] nil if it was not set
examples.full_description: SessionsController post destroy leaves session[:name] nil if it was not set

examples.description: clears session[:name] if it was set
examples.full_description: SessionsController post destroy clears session[:name] if it was set
application/hello.html.erb once a user has logged in shows the users name
sessions/new.html.erb session new shows a login form
